name: Feid
description: '''Salomón Villada Hoyos''' (born 19 August 1992), better known by his stage names '''Feid''' and '''Ferxxo''', is a [[Music of Colombia|Colombian]] singer, songwriter, and record producer. Born in [[Medellín]], [[Colombia]], he has worked with several well-known singers including [[Bad Bunny]], [[J Balvin]], [[Sebastián Yatra]], [[Manuel Turizo]], [[Maluma]], and [[Karol G]].
